scripts.test:k6:all:local: find dist/scripts -type f -name "*.js" | xargs -I {} sh -c 'echo "\nRunning test: {}"; k6 run {} --iterations=1 --duration=10s'
scripts.test:k6:all: cd ../.. && docker compose -f docker-compose.k6.yml run --rm k6 run /dist/scripts/auth/login.bundle.js
scripts.test:k6:all:docker: cd ../.. && find test/k6/dist/scripts -type f -name "*.js" | sort | xargs -I {} sh -c 'echo "\nRunning test: {}"; docker compose -f docker-compose.k6.yml run --rm k6 run /dist/scripts/{##*/} --iterations=1 --duration=10s'
scripts.seed:db: rm -rf prepare/data && ts-node --project tsconfig.json prepare/data-creation.ts && ts-node --project tsconfig.json prepare/db-seed.ts
